triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses formal verification of multi-agent systems, which is the core challenge and application domain.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is the main methodology the paper employs to verify multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Model checking
triples.relevance: Model checking is explicitly mentioned in the paper title as the core verification approach.

triples.name: Formal system
triples.relevance: Formal systems provide the mathematical foundation for specifying logics to verify properties in VITAMIN.

triples.name: Software framework
triples.relevance: VITAMIN is a new composable software framework for modular and versatile formal verification of multi-agent systems.
